content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 175.12 - Approved expenditures for programs for education of certain pupils with disabilities

State Regulations

For the purpose of the apportionment of State aid to school
districts pursuant to subdivision 5 of section
3602
of the

Education Law for the excess cost of educating pupils with certain handicapping
conditions, only those costs which are directly attributable to the provision
of appropriate special services or programs as defined in subdivision 2 of
section
4401
of the

Education Law shall be approved. Indirect costs such as those for district-wide
administration and transportation costs shall not be approved for such
purpose. Notes
